newsitem.title: USA: SEMCO Energy CFO Caldwell resigns.
newsitem.headline: SEMCO Energy CFO Caldwell resigns.

text.p: SEMCO Energy Inc said Robert Caldwell resigned as chief financial officer, effective June 30.
The company said Steven Warsinske, vice president of accounting, will serve as chief financial offer until it identifies a successor to Caldwell from external candidates.

"I'm confident that what I've accomplished, especially in terms of bringing heightened fiscal accountability to the company and pursuing an aggressive growth strategy, helps position SEMCO Energy to take full advantage of opportunities presented by a transforming energy industry," Caldwell said in a statement.
Caldwell has been at the company since 1979. A representative for the company could not be reached for comment.
